review_title: Excellent working condition with decent benefit package

pros: Interntional environment. Best for those who wants to develop career in health related sector.
cons: No benefits for on-contracts staffs! Most positions are stuck! no talent review and promotion system! No "Cost of living" or " inflation" adjustmnet. Internal shfting system is ridiculous.
